name: Etherbound
description:
I'm a 16 year old developer and I've been working on this project for 2 months now. I will try to update the game as frequently as possible, however I need to balance game updates with school work. If you have any feedback, please let me know in the comments. I'm open to all suggestions. Thanks for playing!

The next update will most likely contain menu changes as well as a new level.

For more information on game mechanics and updates, please read the devlogs.

Or check out the game's twitter account https://twitter.com/ETHERBOUND_game.
